senses.sense_definition: Describing a fish or animal that has not had its internal organs removed.

examples.text: The chef prefers to buy <w>ungutted</w> fish to ensure they are as fresh as possible.
We bought some <w>ungutted</w> herring from the market to prepare at home.

senses.sense_definition: Simple past and past participle of <w>ungut</w>.

examples.text: In the strange dream, the fisherman <w>ungutted</w> his catch and threw it back into the sea.
The magical spell <w>ungutted</w> the animal, restoring it to its original form.
